text: {Wahe kawom jen ngon manusia Peue hana teuka dum rasul Allah Padum le rasul geujak bak gata Lam kawan gata cit asai liah Geujak peuingat keu gata bandum Ayat-ayat Lon bandum geukisah Geukheun uroenyo bit dudoe teuka Jijaweub sigra bit na geupeugah b} Kameo ek saksi ateuh droe kamoe Teuma awaknyoe dilee ka salah Ka keunong tipee ngon udep donya Baronyoe teuma meungaku salah Jimeungaku droe dum ka jikaphe
